subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The McLaren driver Heikki Kovalainen captured his first Formula One pole Saturday and will now try for his first victory in the series in British Grand Prix. Kovalainen crossed the finish line more than half a second faster than Red Bull’s Mark Webber, who will also be seeking his first win in Sunday’s race, after the bigger contenders struggled to handle the breezy and wet conditions in Silverstone, England.
